metadata.inclusion:
1. Press and hold either button for three seconds.
2. The LED will flash two times when the remote sends add notification.
3. The LED will keep lighting up for one minute to confirm inclusion.
metadata.exclusion:
1. Press and hold either button for three seconds.
2. The LED will flash two times when the remote sends remove notification.
metadata.reset:
1. Press and release Button 1 ten times quickly. All button presses must be within 6 seconds.
2. The LED will flash five times when completed successfully.
